--- edge_case_dot_star_except_distinct.sql
SELECT (SELECT T.* EXCEPT DISTINCT SELECT T.*) AS n FROM (SELECT 1 AS n) AS T
--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Alias{
        Expr: &ast.ScalarSubQuery{
          Lparen: 7,
          Rparen: 45,
          Query:  &ast.CompoundQuery{
            Op:       "EXCEPT",
            Distinct: true,
            Queries:  []ast.QueryExpr{
              &ast.Select{
                Select:   8,
                Distinct: false,
                As:       nil,
                Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
                  &ast.DotStar{
                    Star: 17,
                    Expr: &ast.Ident{
                      NamePos: 15,
                      NameEnd: 16,
                      Name:    "T",
                    },
                    Except:  (*ast.SelectExcept)(nil),
                    Replace: (*ast.SelectReplace)(nil),
                  },
                },
                From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
                Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
                GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
                Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
                OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
                Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
              },
              &ast.Select{
                Select:   35,
                Distinct: false,
                As:       nil,
                Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
                  &ast.DotStar{
                    Star: 44,
                    Expr: &ast.Ident{
                      NamePos: 42,
                      NameEnd: 43,
                      Name:    "T",
                    },
                    Except:  (*ast.SelectExcept)(nil),
                    Replace: (*ast.SelectReplace)(nil),
                  },
                },
                From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
                Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
                GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
                Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
                OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
                Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
              },
            },
            OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
            Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
          },
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    47,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 50,
            NameEnd: 51,
            Name:    "n",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   52,
      Source: &ast.SubQueryTableExpr{
        Lparen: 57,
        Rparen: 71,
        Query:  &ast.Select{
          Select:   58,
          Distinct: false,
          As:       nil,
          Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
            &ast.Alias{
              Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 65,
                ValueEnd: 66,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "1",
              },
              As: &ast.AsAlias{
                As:    67,
                Alias: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 70,
                  NameEnd: 71,
                  Name:    "n",
                },
              },
            },
          },
          From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
          Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
          GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
          Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
          OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
          Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    73,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 76,
            NameEnd: 77,
            Name:    "T",
          },
        },
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT (SELECT T.* EXCEPT DISTINCT SELECT T.*) AS n FROM (SELECT 1 AS n) AS T
